name: Immortal King's Tribal Binding
flavorText: The mark of the king adorns this belt.
flavorTextHtml: The mark of the king adorns this belt.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Call of the Ancients last until they die.(4) Set:     
 Reduce the cooldown of Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients by 3 seconds for every 10 Fury you spend with an attack.(6) Set:     
 While both Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients is active, you deal 4000% increased damage.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Call of the Ancients last until they die.
(4) Set:
Reduce the cooldown of Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients by 3 seconds for every 10 Fury you spend with an attack.
(6) Set:
While both Wrath of the Berserker and Call of the Ancients is active, you deal 4000% increased damage.
